Much is comprehended in the command, "Go out into the highways and hedges, and compel them to come in, that My house may be filled." [Luke 14:23.] Let ministers teach the truth in families, drawing close to those for whom they labor; and as they thus co-operate with God, He will clothe them with spiritual power. Christ will guide them in their work, giving them words to speak that will sink deep into the hearts of the listeners.
